# Dock, Extended
## Overview
**Size:** 2 ss

**Cost:** 3,000 gp

**Prerequisites:** Four laborers

Similar to the [[Dock, Basic|basic dock]], this larger and more complete structure can accommodate up to two of the largest of vessels, such as galleys and warships, or four smaller craft. Purchase this component multiple times to allow additional ships to moor at the strongholdâ€™s docks.
